What if a printer could print out a 3D object, but it also had the ability to bring it to life?
What if a printer could print out a customized, personalized meal, complete with all the necessary ingredients and cooking instructions?
What if a printer could print out a custom, tailored fragrance, tailored to an individual's preferences and mood?
What if a printer could print out a customized, interactive storybook, complete with animated characters and interactive elements?
What if a printer could print out a custom, wearable piece of art, that changes color and pattern in response to the wearer's emotions?
